de.lmu.ifi.mfa_gui

Class MFAController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.mfa_gui.MFAController

  • public class MFAController
extends java.lang.Object
    The MFAController serves as a controller for its view MFAView. They build an exchangeable controller-view unit in the package mfa_gui, which can be used in an MVC-architecture for a maximum flow algorithm program. Therefore, they use an implementation of the IFlowNetwork interface as data model.

    For additional information about the program, see MFA by Christian Gebhardt on Github.

    Since:
    2016-09-03
    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Christian Gebhardt

    • Constructor Detail

      • MFAController

        public MFAController(MFAView ctrlView,
                     IFlowNetwork ctrlModel)
        The constructor creates an instance of MFAController and constructs the MVC-architecture. Therefore the constructor adds action listener to swing object of the view. This action listeners manipulate the model according to the program logic.
        Parameters:
        ctrlView - the view of the program.
        ctrlModel - the model for the flow network of the program.
